typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{$dtid} as string,
		{$timestamp} as string,
		SequentialNumber as string,
		EMT as string,
		CreateTime as string,
		Status as string,
		ErrorCode as string,
		TotalNum as string,
		Category as string,
		EventTime as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> srccncstatus
source(output(
		{$dtId} as string,
		{$timestamp} as string,
		Tag_Modbus_Humidity as string,
		Tag_D2_Blue as string,
		Tag_Modbus_Temperature as string,
		Tag_D1_Analog as string,
		Tag_Modbus_CO2 as string,
		Tag_D0_Digital as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> IoTHubData
srccncstatus sink(input(
		{$dtId} as string,
		{$timestamp} as string,
		ErrorCode as string,
		TotalNum as string,
		Tag_Modbus_Humidity as string,
		CreateTime as string,
		Status as string,
		EventTime as string,
		SequentialNumber as string,
		Category as string,
		EMT as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	mapColumn(
		{$dtId} = {$dtid},
		{$timestamp},
		ErrorCode,
		TotalNum,
		Tag_Modbus_Humidity = ErrorCode,
		CreateTime,
		Status,
		EventTime,
		SequentialNumber,
		Category,
		EMT
	)) ~> sink1
IoTHubData sink(input(
		{$dtId} as string,
		{$timestamp} as string,
		ErrorCode as string,
		TotalNum as string,
		Tag_Modbus_Humidity as string,
		CreateTime as string,
		Status as string,
		EventTime as string,
		SequentialNumber as string,
		Category as string,
		EMT as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	mapColumn(
		Tag_Modbus_Humidity
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2
